name: Super Goribei
description: Super Goribei is a retro style platformer with small comic like story. Super Goribei is what could be called a pixelated animated mess but with lots of care to the mess all made by the dev. and is right for your faces with this mario clone that now has 46 levels and 2 boss battles for the good of pixel man kind and more to come.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 1.6 GHz Graphics: Pixel Shader Capable Graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 125 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows Xp and other windows not tested
